Texts.Chs: 探索德尔塔·弗雷亚 II
我发现了一个不可知的古代文本。触碰它会产生^red;奇异的幻觉^reset;，看到无数起伏的肉块、^red;多眼的可憎之物^reset;和无数其他奇异的东西。最奇怪的是什么？一个地方，以及它的名字。我应该调查^orange;德尔塔·弗雷亚 II^reset;。它在召唤我。我不得不服从。
Texts.Eng: I've found an unknowably ancient text. Touching it has triggered ^red;strange visions^reset; of endless vistas of undulating flesh, ^red;many-eyed abominations^reset; and countless other bizarre things. And most curiously? a place, and a name for that place. I should investigate ^orange;Delta Freya II^reset;. It calls to me. I am compelled to obey.

Texts.Chs: 无法用语言来表达疯狂和怪异根植在我的灵魂深处。我的一部分永远地消失在了那个地狱里。
Texts.Eng: There are no words to express the madness and strangeness that tugs now at the very roots of my soul. A piece of myself has been forever lost to that hellish place.
